==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|vriundinne}}, from {{inh|de|goh|friuntinna}}. Analyzable as {{suffix|de|Freund|-in}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈfʁɔʏ̯ndɪn/}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Freundin.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Freundin.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Freundinnen|m=Freund}} # [[female]] [[friend]] # [[girlfriend]] ====Usage notes==== * ''Freundin'' (and ''Freund'') may refer to either a platonic friend or a romantic partner. See {{m|de|Freund}} for more. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|nen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
